document.full_text: limits on water temperature and improved safety standards should be adopted for open water swimming competitions, a u.s. panel reviewing the death of an american swimmer last year said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. panel seeks improved safety after crippen death
lines_and_colors: limits on water temperature and improved safety standards should be adopted for open water swimming competitions, a u.s. panel reviewing the death of an american swimmer last year said on wednesday.
